game.name: Robo Frenzy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Slay giant robots and loot their parts to build your own unique, shareable boss battles! Arm yourself with swords, tesla orbs, and potato cannons to capture colossal robos. Customize abilities, style with accessories, and upgrade their attacks to unleash your ultimate boss for the world to fight!
